name: skirbys_world
description: Skirby's World - A 2D platformer game built with HTML5 Canvas

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && cp index.php dist/ && cp IMG_2133.jpeg dist/ && cp LICENSE dist/ && cp README.md dist/
scripts.test: echo "Running game validation tests..." && npm run test:validate
scripts.test:validate: node -e "console.log('Game validation: All external dependencies (Tailwind CSS, Tone.js) are loaded via CDN and should be accessible.'); process.exit(0);"
scripts.lint: echo "No linting configured for this HTML/JS game."

author: Tim Burns
